summary: Fix from_dict silently truncating float IDs by validating that float values are integer-like before conversion

changes.description: Add validation to reject float IDs with non-zero decimals before int conversion
Add regression tests for float ID validation

verification_commands: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_2000_json_validation.py
uv run ruff format --check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_2000_json_validation.py
